creator: roku@apache.org
text:
To repeoduce:

* add a doc in german laguage.
* edit any doc with kupu 
* open the internal link drwaer and click on "Sitetree Links"

Result: Nothing is displaye

* now add a new language version (english) and it wroks again
* deleting the german version also makes it work again

text: I would need to have another look. Mabye I will remember the possible fix...
